title: Jehoram’s Evil Reign
summary: Jehoshaphat’s son Jehoram becomes king and immediately kills his brothers. He leads Judah into idolatry, and God allows enemies to attack. Elijah sends a letter rebuking him, and Jehoram dies painfully, unloved and unmourned.

faq.question: What were Jehoram’s major sins?
faq.answer: He murdered his brothers and led Judah into idolatry.

faq.question: How did Jehoram die?
faq.answer: From a painful disease as a result of God’s judgment.
